Instructions: Using the provided web search results, write a comprehensive reply to the given query. Make sure to cite results using [[number](URL)] notation after the reference. If the provided search results refer to multiple subjects with the same name, write separate answers for each subject.
Query: search on internet job opportunity as Cloud DevOps Expert remote only worldwide
and give me the url link for each of them

Here are some results I found from a web search for job opportunities as a Cloud DevOps Expert that are remote only and worldwide:

1. Turing: Turing offers remote DevOps engineer jobs that are designed to suit your career growth as a DevOps engineer. Join a network of the world's best engineers & get full-time, long-term remote DevOps engineer jobs with better compensation. [[1](https://www.turing.com/jobs/remote-devops-jobs)]
2. Upwork: Upwork lists 749 open remote DevOps engineer jobs that you can browse. The job listings provide detailed information on job requirements, compensation, duration, and employer history. Cloud computing with services such as Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a necessary skill. [[2](https://www.upwork.com/freelance-jobs/devops/)]
3. Indeed: Blockchain Solutions Network has job openings for DevOps engineers that require 5-6 years of experience with cloud infrastructure, deployment pipelines, and application environments. [[3](https://in.indeed.com/Devops-Engineer-jobs-in-Remote)]
4. DevOps Remotely: DevOps Remotely is a job board that lists all remote DevOps jobs worldwide. More than 200 remote DevOps, SysOps, Google Cloud, AWS, Azure, and Cloud architect jobs are available for candidates. [[4](https://devopsremotely.com/)]
5. Toptal: Toptal provides freelance DevOps engineer jobs with top global clients. Freelance Developers have the freedom to choose their own DevOps Engineer jobs with leading Fortune 500 companies and startups, as well as the flexibility to work remotely on their terms. [[5](https://www.toptal.com/freelance-jobs/developers/devops)]
6. Remote.co: Remote.co lists the best international remote jobs. Remote work brings together the best talent and employers no matter where they live. The website provides the latest remote jobs without any location stipulations. [[6](https://remote.co/international-remote-jobs/)]
7. Remote Workers: Remote Workers offers a comprehensive list of remote jobs in Worldwide from the best remote companies. Candidates can work from home or anywhere they want. [[7](https://remoteworkers.net/remote-jobs/region-worldwide)]
8. We Work Remotely: We Work Remotely is a job board that lists 100% remote jobs worldwide. They provide full-time and part-time job opportunities in a wide range of industries. [[8](https://weworkremotely.com/100-percent-remote-jobs)]

These are some of the websites I found with job opportunities for Cloud DevOps Experts that are remote only and worldwide. You can click on the links to learn more about each opportunity.
